Package com.l2h1.tamagotchi.fragments

Class HygieneFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.l2h1.tamagotchi.fragments.HygieneFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HygieneFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment representing the bathroom, where the user can wash his Tamagotchi.

    • saveInitSoapXY

      private void saveInitSoapXY(float soapX, float soapY)
      Retrieves the X and Y coordinates of the soap at the moment the user's finger is first placed on the screen. This allows the soap to be repositioned when the user releases it, as the exact position of a View cannot be known before rendering.
      Parameters:
      soapX - the X position of the soap
      soapY - the Y position of the soap

    • resetSoapProgress

      private void resetSoapProgress()
      Resets soaping progress value to 0.
